name: House Plant
description:
Keep your plant safe from the elements of the world!

This is my first game ever and definitively my first game to be uploaded to itch.io

Heater raises the temperature.
Window gives light but also raises temperature.

Fan lowers temperature.

Sink gives water but also lowers temperature.

I wanted to add a bar that made you stay at the phone for a certain amount of time and in hindsight I should've made the bars drop down faster and faster making the game harder but... it is what it is.
